game.name: Zombie Run
game.description:
This brand action-packed challenge has lots of reasons to create Goosebumps in your body. Would you like to give it a try to practice your abilities on how to handle some deadly creatures? Join Zombie Run and be prepared to run like the fast wind, shoot like a mad person and jump like an expert jumper!  Choose any option between the two normal mode and boss mode and get ready to see how this brave hero finishes a horde of monsters with ease!

There are six dangerous and incredible worlds to explore so he needs your help to complete all the missions in this HTML5 zombie game. The portal-hopping and guns blazing will be enough to keep you glued to the screen for long. Be careful since you would have only three lives to lose! Try to kill as many blood-thirsty zombies as you can to finish your game with the maximum possible score! When the game finishes, you can track how many bad souls you have killed or how many you have run away.

Hit the again button and start having fun in this action jumping game! The path is full of spikes and dangerous gaps so try to avoid them to cover the farthest distance. Grab as many coins as you can to purchase new weapons and skins for your character! Try out more challenging and engaging fighting challenges on atmegame.com when you browse through our extensive category of free action games. The best part is that you can enjoy all of them without download games in your device. Good luck to have blast in the best virtual gaming environment!
